data.name: Somerholm
data.detailed_description:
Somerholm is a photography based island generator with a focus on customizing the islands you explore and having control over numerous camera options. Discover various points of interest while exploring islands you create and take photographs along the way to fill your photo gallery.

FEATURES
  • Numerous Generation Options
    Whether you want to change the overall island height or just how many trees are generated the choice is up to you. Of course you can always leave everything completely randomized for a fresh experience.
  • At Least A Few Camera Options
    Change the brightness, contrast, field of view, saturation, color depth, resolution, and more in real time while taking photos to get the perfect shot.
  • Intrigue Awaits
    Discover various points of interest while exploring the various islands of Somerholm; ranging from fire pits, to buildings, to watchtowers, and more.
  • A Unique Art Style
    Explore islands in a charming simplistic view, reminiscent of limited color depth stock photos of the wild.
  • Photo Gallery
    View taken photos while exploring the island or view all photos taken of your previous journeys in the main menu.
data.about_the_game:
Somerholm is a photography based island generator with a focus on customizing the islands you explore and having control over numerous camera options. Discover various points of interest while exploring islands you create and take photographs along the way to fill your photo gallery.

  • Intrigue Awaits

data.short_description: Create, explore, and take pictures of randomly generated islands with your dog right beside you.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 7 SP1+
  • Processor: X64 architecture w/ SSE2 support
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Graphics card with DX10 (shader model 4.0) capabilities
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 200 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: X64 architecture w/ SSE2 support
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Graphics card with DX10 (shader model 4.0) capabilities
  • Storage: 200 MB available space
